name: Nestle Nido 1+ Growing Up Milk Powder (1-3 Y)
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from Switzerland. Important Notice: There are no substitutes for or equivalent to breast milk. Nestle NIDO 1+ is a Growing Up Milk Powder for 1 to 3-year-old growing up children. It contains-Prebiotics (Inulin & Fructooligosaccharides)6 Immuno-nutrients (Iron, Zinc, Selenium, Vitamin A, D & C) among 22 essential vitamins & minerals]Milk ProteinHoneyNo added sucrose Net Weight: 350 gmManufactured by: Nestlé Chile S.A.Formulated by: Nestle Switzerland S.A.Marketed by: Nestle Bangladesh Limited

name: Nestle NAN 2 OPTIPRO Formula (6-12 months) Tin
description:
Important Notice: There is no substitutes of or equivalent to breast-milk Nestlé® NAN® OPTIPRO® 2 is an Follow-up Formula with OPTIPRO designed for infants after 6 months onwards as the liquid part of the diet during and after weaning, in addition to other foods. It is not to be used as a breast milk substitute during the first 6 months of life.  Nestlé® NAN® OPTIPRO® 2 contains: - OPTIPRO®, an optimized protein blend exclusively to NAN® that is unique in both quality and amount. It supplies the adequate amount of proteins needed for your baby’s optimal growth without overloading immature organs.  - BIFIDUS BL is a probiotic culture that helps to reinforce baby’s defense system. - DHA and ARA, two special fatty acids found in breast milk, which are important for your baby’s immune defense system and contribute to the development of brain and vision. Storage instructions: Follow instructions on the pack Manufactured by Nestlé Philippines Ltd.Marketed by Nestle Bangladesh Ltd. 
Important Notice: There is no substitutes of or equivalent to breast-milk
 
Nestlé® NAN® OPTIPRO® 2 is an Follow-up Formula with OPTIPRO designed for infants after 6 months onwards as the liquid part of the diet during and after weaning, in addition to other foods. It is not to be used as a breast milk substitute during the first 6 months of life. 
 
Nestlé® NAN® OPTIPRO® 2 contains:
 - OPTIPRO®, an optimized protein blend exclusively to NAN® that is unique in both quality and amount. It supplies the adequate amount of proteins needed for your baby’s optimal growth without overloading immature organs. 
 - BIFIDUS BL is a probiotic culture that helps to reinforce baby’s defense system.
 - DHA and ARA, two special fatty acids found in breast milk, which are important for your baby’s immune defense system and contribute to the development of brain and vision.
 
Storage instructions: Follow instructions on the pack
 
Manufactured by Nestlé Philippines Ltd.
Marketed by Nestle Bangladesh Ltd.

name: Aptamil 1 First Infant Milk (From Birth)
description:
Help your children to grow healthier and faster. Get Aptamil First Infant Baby Milk Stage 1 (From Birth) - 800g and help your child enjoy every moment. The product is available in Bangladesh. Mixed with high-quality ingredients it will provide sufficient nutrients to promote healthy growth. With 29% fortified milk and dual prebiotics, it will help your kids immensely to help with digestion. The product also contains DHA which also helps to improve brain function and eyesight. The formula contains the necessary nutrients and vitamins to support with immune system. The milk is safe to use feed. It does not contain any palm oil, preservatives, or harsh chemicals. You can get this amazing milk formula for your little one and help them stay fit.  Key benefits of Aptamil 3 Growing Up Baby Milk Powder:  •Has 29% dairy-based milk.•Maintain essential nutrients.•Helps to boost cognitive function.•Increase eye vision.•Helps with digestion.•Develop a better immune system.•Helps to strengthen bones and teeth.•Has fortified milk.•Improve the process of normal growth.•Does not have palm oil.•Has plentiful protein, iron, and calcium.•Support with significant nutritional needs.•It provides nourishment. Technical details of the Product:•Brand: Aptamil•Model: 1•Product Type: Milk Powder•Usability: Infant from birth•Packaging: Plastic container•Concern: Nutrition

name: Biomil 1 Milk Powder (0-6 months)
description:
Breast milk is the nutrition that is best suited to infants. BIOMIL® 1 may be used as a supplement to or replacement for breast milk should this be lacking or insufficient.  BIOMIL® 1 is a preparation based on modified cows’ milk to ensure it is precisely adapted to the nutritional needs of infants. BIOMIL® 1 contains partially skimmed cows’ milk, demineralized whey, vegetable oils, lactose, and supplements of calcium, zinc and copper, iron salt,s, and 14 vitamins. BIOMIL® 1 is a milk formula that is especially well tolerated by infants between 0 and 6 months. It may be used as a replacement for breast milk should this not be available, or as weaning food if the quantity of breast milk no longer meets the infant’s needs. BIOMIL® 1 complies with the standards of the Codex Alimentarius and with the recommendations of the European Union, as well as with those of the European Society for Paediatric Gastroenterology, Hepatology and Nutrition (ESPGHAN).

name: Similac Infant Formula 3 Tin (1-3 Years)
description:
Similac Infant Formula 3 is a scientifically designed growing-up milk formula tailored for toddlers aged 1–3 years. It provides essential nutrients to support your child’s growth and development during their formative years. Fortified with a unique blend of vitamins, minerals, and other key nutrients, this formula helps meet your child’s nutritional needs when transitioning to a more varied diet. ✔️Key Ingredients • DHA & AA (Docosahexaenoic Acid & Arachidonic Acid): Supports brain and eye development, critical for cognitive and visual growth.• Vitamin D and Calcium: Essential for strong bones and teeth, aiding overall physical development.• Prebiotics (FOS): Helps promote healthy digestion by supporting gut health and encouraging the growth of beneficial bacteria.• Iron: A vital component for brain development and red blood cell production.• Zinc & Selenium: Boost immunity and promote healthy cell growth.• Vitamins (A, C, E, and B-complex): Aid in overall growth, energy production, and maintaining a robust immune system.• Protein: Provides essential amino acids to support muscle growth and repair.• Carbohydrates & Fats: Offer sustained energy for active toddlers.   ✔️Nutritional Benefits • Brain Development: DHA, AA, and iron work together to support cognitive growth and sharper learning abilities.• Bone Strength: Calcium and Vitamin D strengthen bones and teeth, ensuring optimal physical development.• Healthy Digestion: Prebiotics (FOS) promote gut health and improve digestion, reducing discomfort.• Immunity Support: Vitamins A, C, E, Zinc, and Selenium build a strong immune system to fight common infections.• Energy Boost: A balanced mix of carbohydrates and fats provides the energy toddlers need for their active lives.• Overall Growth: A complete nutrient profile ensures the holistic development of your child.  ✔️Additional Information • Age Suitability: Specifically designed for toddlers aged 1–3 years.• Pack Size: 800g tin for convenience and longer-lasting use.• Storage: Store in a cool, dry place. Always reseal the tin after each use to maintain freshness.
Similac Infant Formula 3 is a scientifically designed growing-up milk formula tailored for toddlers aged 1–3 years. It provides essential nutrients to support your child’s growth and development during their formative years. Fortified with a unique blend of vitamins, minerals, and other key nutrients, this formula helps meet your child’s nutritional needs when transitioning to a more varied diet.
 
✔️Key Ingredients
 
• DHA & AA (Docosahexaenoic Acid & Arachidonic Acid): Supports brain and eye development, critical for cognitive and visual growth.
• Vitamin D and Calcium: Essential for strong bones and teeth, aiding overall physical development.
• Prebiotics (FOS): Helps promote healthy digestion by supporting gut health and encouraging the growth of beneficial bacteria.
• Iron: A vital component for brain development and red blood cell production.
• Zinc & Selenium: Boost immunity and promote healthy cell growth.
• Vitamins (A, C, E, and B-complex): Aid in overall growth, energy production, and maintaining a robust immune system.
• Protein: Provides essential amino acids to support muscle growth and repair.
• Carbohydrates & Fats: Offer sustained energy for active toddlers.
 
 
 
✔️Nutritional Benefits
 
• Brain Development: DHA, AA, and iron work together to support cognitive growth and sharper learning abilities.
• Bone Strength: Calcium and Vitamin D strengthen bones and teeth, ensuring optimal physical development.
• Healthy Digestion: Prebiotics (FOS) promote gut health and improve digestion, reducing discomfort.
• Immunity Support: Vitamins A, C, E, Zinc, and Selenium build a strong immune system to fight common infections.
• Energy Boost: A balanced mix of carbohydrates and fats provides the energy toddlers need for their active lives.
• Overall Growth: A complete nutrient profile ensures the holistic development of your child.
 
 
✔️Additional Information
 
• Age Suitability: Specifically designed for toddlers aged 1–3 years.
• Pack Size: 800g tin for convenience and longer-lasting use.
• Storage: Store in a cool, dry place. Always reseal the tin after each use to maintain freshness.

name: Mother's Smile Lacto Fix Anti Diarrhoea Formula Tin
entry: Mother's Smile Lacto Fix Anti Diarrhoea Formula Tin
description:
Completely Lactose-Free Formula, ages 0 to 24, Suitable for babies with Lactose intolerance. Anti-Diarrhoea / Lactose-free formula, ages 0 to 24 months, contains apple and banana powder with corn starch, which is very important for quick recovery during the diarrhoeal period.
Completely Lactose-Free Formula, ages 0 to 24, Suitable for babies with Lactose intolerance. Anti-Diarrhoea / Lactose-free formula, ages 0 to 24 months, contains apple and banana powder with corn starch, which is very important for quick recovery during the diarrhoeal period.

name: Biomil 4 Follow-Up Milk Powder Tin (2-3 Years)
description:
Biomil 4 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder has been specially developed to balance nutrition and favour the maximum growth of children aged 1 year and over.  Biomil 4 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder is a preparation based on fresh cows’ milk, rich in energy so as to meet the increased energy needs for this age group.  Biomil 4 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder contains milk proteins, vegetable oils, lactose, maltodextrin and saccharose.  Biomil 4 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder is enriched with essential fatty acids, iron, zinc, copper, iodine, and 13 vitamins including most notably vitamins A, B, C, D, E, and K so as to meet the needs of small children.

name: Nestle NAN 1 OPTIPRO Formula (0 to 6 months) Tin
description:
Important Notice: There is no substitutes of or equivalent to breast-milk Nestlé® NAN® OPTIPRO® 1 is an Infant Formula with OPTIPRO designed for infants from Birth onwards when they are not breastfed. Nestlé® NAN® OPTIPRO® 1 contains: - OPTIPRO®, an optimized protein blend exclusively to NAN® that is unique in both quality and amount. It supplies the adequate amount of proteins needed for your baby’s optimal growth without overloading immature organs.  - BIFIDUS BL is a probiotic culture that helps to reinforce baby’s defense system. - DHA and ARA, two special fatty acids found in breast milk, which are important for your baby’s immune defense system and contribute to the development of brain and vision. Storage instructions: Follow instructions on the pack Manufactured by Nestle Philippines Ltd.Marketed by Nestle Bangladesh Ltd.
Important Notice: There is no substitutes of or equivalent to breast-milk
 
Nestlé® NAN® OPTIPRO® 1 is an Infant Formula with OPTIPRO designed for infants from Birth onwards when they are not breastfed.
 
Nestlé® NAN® OPTIPRO® 1 contains:
 - OPTIPRO®, an optimized protein blend exclusively to NAN® that is unique in both quality and amount. It supplies the adequate amount of proteins needed for your baby’s optimal growth without overloading immature organs. 
 - BIFIDUS BL is a probiotic culture that helps to reinforce baby’s defense system.
 - DHA and ARA, two special fatty acids found in breast milk, which are important for your baby’s immune defense system and contribute to the development of brain and vision.
 
Storage instructions: Follow instructions on the pack
 
Manufactured by Nestle Philippines Ltd.
Marketed by Nestle Bangladesh Ltd.

name: Nestle Pre Nan Premature & Low Birth Weight (0-6 M)
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from Switzerland. Important Notice: There is no substitutes of or equivalent to breast-milk. Nestlé Pre NAN is produced as per the Bangladesh standard for formulas for special medical purposes intended for infants. Nestlé Pre NAN is a Special Dietary Formula for Premature and Low Birth Weight Infants which can be given from birth onwards in accordance with the advice of Medical Professionals. It contains: •DHA/ARA •MCT Oil  •Adequate amounts of easily digestible Proteins and Calories•Optimized Calcium and Phosphorous levels •Essential Vitamin-MineralsNet Weight: 400 gm Manufactured by: Nestlé Netherlands Formulated by: Nestlé Switzerland S.A. Marketed by: Nestlé Bangladesh Limited 
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from Switzerland.

Nestlé Pre NAN is produced as per the Bangladesh standard for formulas for special medical purposes intended for infants. 
Nestlé Pre NAN is a Special Dietary Formula for Premature and Low Birth Weight Infants which can be given from birth onwards in accordance with the advice of Medical Professionals. It contains: 
•DHA/ARA 
•MCT Oil  
•Adequate amounts of easily digestible Proteins and Calories
•Optimized Calcium and Phosphorous levels 
•Essential Vitamin-Minerals
Net Weight: 400 gm 
Manufactured by: Nestlé Netherlands 
Formulated by: Nestlé Switzerland S.A. 
Marketed by: Nestlé Bangladesh Limited
